name: PokéTHROW
tagline: A Game based on Pokémon Trainers battling each other by throwing Pokéballs on the opponent.
body:
### Welcome to PokéTHROW an open source Unity3D Game Project

### Changelogs
Changelog Beta 2.0:

- Project Upgraded to Unity 5
- Replaced Calem with Brandon as playable Character
- Fixed Camera-Texture-Overlap-Bug


Changelog Beta 1.0:

- Added new Terrain
- Added Music
- Added Jump Animation
- Fixed Jump Bug

### Download latest Release
Step 1: Click the "View on GitHub" Button Above

Step 2: Select Releases in the repo and download the latest Release

### Authors and Contributors
Game is Developed by Adrian Fernández Castro

### Support or Contact
E-Mail: adrian.f.castro.mail@gmail.com

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/adrian.fernandezcastro.77)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
